Documents

Digital document workflow is the life-blood of many financial services processes, all the way from loan underwriting to collections. Many document management systems offer piecemeal solutions, but the Autospaces Document Manager system integrates digital documents directly into your workflow.

Documents can be created from incoming faxes, email attachments, scans, credit bureaus, or uploaded from desktop computers. No matter how a document is input into the system, it is automatically categorized, and associated with relevant operational data, such as data items about a loan application, a buyback, or a repo.

In addition, a document can also be assigned to any user with a login to your system.
